summary: Advanced JavaScript developer, experienced in creation of modern, fast and scalable applications. OSS contributor of such projects like Material-UI, React-native, Formik, i18next and creator of material-ui-pickers. Good understanding of both OOP and FP paradigms, design patterns and architecture concepts. Experienced in developing large, scalable and sound web/mobile applications with a help of cutting-edge technologies.

employment.responsibilities: Studying and development of large, scaling web application.
Full-stack javascript development, team leadership, designing project architecture and development flow
Support and maintain popular open-source projects

education.place: Kharkiv computer and technology college - Ukraine
